# async_structured_call

The AsyncStructuredCall module for generating structured responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_call/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_call/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_call/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/async_structured_call/index" symbolName="BaseStructuredCall" /> BaseStructuredCall

A base class for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/async_structured_call/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredCall" /> AsyncStructuredCall

A class for generating structured responses using LLMs asynchronously.
